## Experiment

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  ggwedge:::geom_pie() + 
  coord_radial(expand = F) + 
  aes(fill = cut) + 
  facet_wrap(~color) 

last_plot() + 
  facet_null() +
  ggwedge:::geom_pie_label(r_prop = 1.15)
```
